title: Imposes criminal penalties for death or serious injury of individuals resulting from violations of the multiple dwelling law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing criminal negligence for individuals who violate or assist in the violation of any provision of the multiple dwelling law where such violation has resulted in the death of another; and to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to increasing the penalties for persons who violate or assist in the violation of any provision of the multiple dwelling law where such violation has resulted in serious physical injury
